# devtools::load_all()
data(nutrimouse)
data = list(gene = nutrimouse$gene, lipid = nutrimouse$lipid)
Y = nutrimouse$diet

data("breast.TCGA")

data <- mapply(breast.TCGA$data.test[1:2], breast.TCGA$data.train[1:2], FUN = rbind, SIMPLIFY = FALSE)
Y <- c(breast.TCGA$data.train$subtype, breast.TCGA$data.test$subtype)
bp <- lapply(list(dev="dev", current="current"), function(version){
    wrapper_predict(data = data, Y = Y, ncomp = 2, n_test_per_class = 40, keepX = 2, version = version)$accuracy
})
bp
